name: unclean
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not clean and therefore likely to cause disease: The health risk from drinking unclean water is considerable.
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
not cleandirtyThis shirt is dirty.filthyWash your hands before dinner - they're filthy!scruffyHe's the typical scruffy student.messyBen's bedroom is always really messy.grimyDon't wipe your grimy hands on that clean towel!
See more results »
formal not clean or pure, or morally bad, as described by the rules of a religion: Jews and Muslims consider pigs unclean.
